channel.description: Recent content in web development on NTMV

item.title: Wordpress Website, But Without PHP
item.description: What is Meson Guru? Meson.Guru is a semi-automatic news aggregator for Meson Network. You can find all the latest news, tweets, and videos about Meson Network in one place. We do not republish or store any material on our server. We simply provide a link to the relevant content. Backed When the idea of creating such a website came to me, I decided to build my own little CMS with node.
